titleStmt.title: Iohn Huighen van Linschoten. his discours of voyages into ye Easte & West Indies Deuided into foure bookes.
Itinerario. English
titleStmt.author: Linschoten, Jan Huygen van, 1563-1611.

titleStmt.title: Iohn Huighen van Linschoten. his discours of voyages into ye Easte & West Indies Deuided into foure bookes.
Itinerario. English
titleStmt.author: Linschoten, Jan Huygen van, 1563-1611.
Phillip, William.
Rogers, William, b. ca. 1545, engraver.
Beckit, Robert, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [John Windet for] Iohn Wolfe printer to ye Honorable Cittie of London,

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved and signed: Willms Rogers ciuis Londinensis inuentor et sculptor.

"The second booke. The true and perfect description of the whole coast of Guinea, Manicongo, Angola, Monomotapa ..", "The thirde booke. The nauigation of the Portingales into the East Indies ..", and "The fourth booke. A most true and certaine extract and summarie of all the rents, demaines, tolles .. of the King of Spaine .." each has separate title page dated 1598 and stating "[Translated] .. out of Dutch into English by W.P." (i.e. William Phillip); pagination and register are continuous.
The maps are engraved by Robert Beckit; the title page and remaining plates are by William Rogers.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
